msContents.summary: A Karaim translation of the Torah and the Haftarah

ab.l: And the Lord spoketo Moses, saying,
‘Command the children of Israel,and say to them, “When you come to the land, to the land of Canaan,this is the land that will fall to you as a share, the land of Canaanby its borders:
And your will be the south side,from the wilderness of Zin next to Edom,and your will be the south border from the edge of the saltsea eastward.
And your border will turnfrom the south to the ascent of Akrabbim,and pass on to Zin. And its ends will be from the southto Kadesh-Barnea, and will go out to Hazar-Addar and pass on to Azmon.
And the border shall turn from Azmon to the river of Egypt,and the ends of it will be to the sea.
Andthe western border: you shall have the Great Sea for a border.This will be your west border.
And this will beyour north border: from the Great Sea you shall mark |it| outfor yourself to Mount Hor.
From Mount Hor you shall mark |it| out to Lebo-Hamath, and the ends of the border will be at Zedad.
And the border shall go out to Ziphron, and the ends of it will be at Hazar-Enan.This will be your north border.
And you shall mark outyour east border from Hazar-Enan to Shepham.
And the border will go down from Shepham toward Riblah, on the east sideto the fountain of water, and the border will go down and will reachto the eastern side of the Sea of Kinnereth.
Andthe border shall go down to the Jordan, and the ends of it will be at the Salt Sea.This will be your land by its borders all around.’
And Moses commanded the children of Israel, saying, ‘This is theland which you shall divide by lot, which the Lord commanded to give to the ninetribes and to the half tribe:
Because the tribeof the children of Reuben by the house of their fathers and the tribe of the childrenof Gad by the house of their fathers and the half tribe of Manasseh had taken their share.
The two tribes and the half tribe had taken their shareacross the ford of Jordan of Jericho toward the sun rising, eastward.’
And the Lord spoke to Moses, saying,
‘These are the names of the men who shall divide the land to you:Eleazar, the priest, and Joshua, son of Nun.
And you shall take one leader of each tribe, one leader of each tribe, to sharethe land.
And these are the names of the men:Of the tribe of Judah: Caleb, son of Jephunneh.
Andof the tribe of the children of Simeon: Shemuel, son of Ammihud.
Of the tribe of Benjamin: Elidad, son of Chislon.
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Dan: Bukki, sonof Jogli.
The prince of the children of Joseph, of the tribe of the childrenof Manasseh: Hanniel, son of Ephod.
Andthe prince of the tribe of the children of Ephraim: Kemuel, son of Shiphtan.
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Zebulun: Elizaphan,son of Parnach.
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Issachar:Paltiel, son of Azzan.
And the prince of the tribeof the children of Asher: Ahihud, son of Shelomi.
And the prince of the tribe of the children of Naphtali: Pedahel, son of Ammihud.’
These are the ones whom the Lord commanded to divide |the inheritance| to the childrenof Israel in the land of Canaan.

app.note: A mistranslation based on interpreting BHeb. מִשְּׁפָם הָרִבְלָה ‘from Shepham toward Riblah’ as one place name.
